code: import _objectSpread from"/home/samyarsworld/Desktop/first-react-project/fetch-json-server/react-web-design/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{Dishes}from'./dishes';import{Comments}from'./comments';import{Promotions}from'./promotions';import{Leaders}from'./leaders';import{InitialFeedback}from'./forms';import{createForms}from'react-redux-form';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import logger from'redux-logger';export var ConfigureStore=function ConfigureStore(){var store=createStore(combineReducers(_objectSpread({dishes:Dishes,comments:Comments,promotions:Promotions,leaders:Leaders},createForms({feedback:InitialFeedback}))),applyMiddleware(thunk,logger));return store;};
